properties.Text: Q05. Reasons for not converting yourself into a S2S farmers (cultivating at least one plot with only CNF inputs, without applying any fertilizers, pesticides, weedicides, etc)
5.1. Why are you continuously using agrochemicals in all your plots/ fields?
Q050101. Do not have complete knowledge
Q050103. APCNF alone is not profitable
Q050105. Shortage of livestock for dung and urine
Q050106. Shortage of raw material to prepare CNF inputs
Q050108. APCNF inputs are not available
Q050112. Preparation of CNF input is time consuming
5.2. If facilitated, would you like to become S2S farmer?
Q0503. If yes, what support you want? (Multiple answers are possible. do not read the options. Probe and tap the Switch to Select or Unselect)
Q050301. Higher prices for CNF output
Q050306. Subsidy for CNF input making instruments and tools
Q050309. Free or subsidy seed of PMDS
